ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mrCls ` C ) = ( mrCls ` C ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_isnacs2 | |- ( C e. ( NoeACS ` X ) <-> ( C e. ( ACS ` X ) /\ ( ( mrCls ` C ) " ( ~P X i^i Fin ) ) = C ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simplbi | |- ( C e. ( NoeACS ` X ) -> C e. ( ACS ` X ) ) |
